original_text: I did not receive it from any man, nor was I taught it; rather, I received it by revelation from Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 이는 내가 사람에게서 받은 것도 아니요 배운 것도 아니요 오직 예수 그리스도의 계시로 말미암은 것이라

sentences.original_text: I did not receive it from any man
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것을 어떤 사람에게서도 받지 않았고

sentences.original_text: rather, I received it by revelation
